Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Ceramic \Ce*ram"ic\, a. [Gr. ?, fr. ? earthenware. Cf. {Keramic}.] Of or pertaining to pottery; relating to the art of making earthenware; as, ceramic products; ceramic ornaments for ceilings. [1913 Webster]
ceramic adj : of or relating to or made from a ceramic; "a ceramic dish" n : an artifact made of hard brittle material produced from nonmetallic minerals by firing at high temperatures
